name: Ashwin!
greetingText: Alright, You've finally found a way to escape us!
wishText: May the js.prototypes always be with you! ;)
text1: You've been the glue that held our chaos together, and somehow managed to make it look easy!
textInChatBox: You'll be missed, Wishing you all the best for your future endeavours. blah blah..!
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishHeading: We'll try to remember all your wisdon.. or atleast where you hid your minion xD
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
